title: People of Spain
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Clifford J. Kamen
brief_description: Shows, by animated maps and live action, the geographical and historical influences which worked in combination to produce the modern nation of Spain. Points out the diverse national strains brought to Iberia by successive waves of settlers, immigrants, and conquerors, including the Romans, Basques, Moors, and Catalans. Shows how the climate and fertility of the soil influence agriculture and settlement and depicts the chief cities, industries and products.
